titles.title: The Business Startup Clarification Act of 2018
To remove the limitation on large accelerated filers qualifying as an emerging growth company, and for other purposes.
The Business Startup Clarification Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
The Business Startup Clarification Act of 2018
This bill amends the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to allow a large accelerated filer to be considered an emerging growth company under certain circumstances.
